    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminHomePage
    AdminHomePage displays the admin interface where OTP reset requests can be processed and user roles can be managed.
    AdminSetupPage
    The SetupAdmin class handles the setup process for creating an administrator account.
    Answer
     
    AnswerList
     
    DatabaseHelper
    The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes.
    DatabaseView
     
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    InvitationPage
    InvitePage class represents the page where an admin can generate an invitation code.
    OtpRequest
     
    PasswordEvaluator
     
    PasswordResetPage
    PasswordResetPage - Allows users to log in with an OTP.
    PostAnswer
     
    PostQuestion
     
    PostReview
     
    Question
    The User class represents a user entity in the system.
    QuestionList
     
    Review
     
    ReviewerList
     
    SetupAccountPage
    SetupAccountPage class handles the account setup process for new users.
    SetupLoginSelectionPage
    The SetupLoginSelectionPage class allows users to choose between setting up a new account or logging into an existing account.
    StaffDashboard
    The StaffDashboard class is responsible for displaying the dashboard used by staff members to review questions, answers, and private messages.
    staffRoleJUnitTest
     
    StartCSE360
     
    UpdateAnswer
     
    UpdateQuestion
     
    User
    The User class represents a user entity in the system.
    UserHomePage
    This page displays a simple welcome message for the user.
    UserLoginPage
    The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts.
    UserNameRecognizer
     
    UserRecord
     
    WelcomeLoginPage
    The WelcomeLoginPage class displays a welcome screen for authenticated users.
